name: Misericordia
additionalNotes:
THIS VERSION OF "MISERICORDIA" IS A BRAND NEW BLEND AS OF 2/1/19 & HAS BEEN METICULOUSLY CRAFTED BY MASTER BLENDER CHRISTIAN EIROA, OWNER OF CLE CIGARS & ORIGINAL OWNER OF CAMACHO CIGARS. THEY ARE SUPERB!

Sweet & buttery Connecticut wrapper, well balanced floral tones...excellently constructed.

6 inches long x 50 ring gauge, "Toro" size
